title: Everytime i open launcher i get bugsplat
body: Plz help. I havent been able to play league for a week. I dont know what caused this someone plz help. When i try to open the launcher it tries to open then it bugsplats. I dont know what to do!

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often caused by driver or hardware issues. We've gathered the most common fixes inside our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I strongly recommend starting there.

Let me know if those steps helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KWFznf2E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-25T22:02:22.669+0000)
>
> Bugsplats are often caused by driver or hardware issues. We've gathered the most common fixes inside our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I strongly recommend starting there.
> 
> Let me know if those steps helped.

They did not help plz fix this i havent payed in a week. ive used so much money on this game as well.

In that case, we'll need to dive into some logs to look further into this. I'd like you to reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you attach a set of logs to your ticket using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite the troubleshooting process.
